text: Hagi tamagesa antahiho, Kraisi koramo'a razankrefa me'neankino, fri avu'avazama nehunkeno tagutagesa azeri agru higeta, kasefa huno mani'nea Anumzamofona monora hunentone. Na'ankure manivava Avamumofo hankavere, Kraisi'a kefozama'a omne ne'mo, Anumzamofontera Agra'a avufga tagri kumikura aguza rune.
